hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Eyeball Frog#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Saria's Song#.
